general.name: Name

success.title: Success
success.text: Your changes have been successfully saved!

Owner.title: Owner
Owner.description: Owners can take the same actions as administrators, but they have the additional authority to end the campaign

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Admins can create content for a campaign, play encounters and access the campaign settings page but cannot delete the campaign

Viewer.title: Player
Viewer.description: Players only have the option to play encounters and not edit content

noContent.title: No {content} yet
noContent.text: The quest for {content} begins here, but it's yet to be undertaken

general.notAllowed: Action not allowed: you are not the owner or administrator

fail.title: Mail is not sent
fail.text: Something went wrong while trying to send the email

textBlock1.title: Made with love
textBlock1.text: At dnd-tracker, we are not of many words. We let the product speak for itself. What was an encounter tracker as a main idea quickly turned into a much bigger thing. With more and more ideas coming forward, we are currently expanding the dnd-tracker. This will make playing even more exciting, mysterious, easier AND more enjoyable.
textBlock1.text2: Try the Encounter Tracker now without creating an account!

summary.title: A tracker with unique skills
summary.item2: We are constantly working to optimize the product
summary.item3: Everything in 1 convenient place for the DM
summary.item5: Plenty of information you can get your hands on

textBlock2.title: Collaborative Dungeon Mastering
textBlock2.text: Join forces with fellow Dungeon Masters in a realm where creativity knows no bounds. Our platform allows you to seamlessly collaborate on your Dungeons & Dragons campaigns, fostering a dynamic and immersive experience. Whether you're crafting epic adventures, creating homebrew, or co-managing games, our system brings DMs together, making your campaigns more thrilling and memorable.

textBlock3.title: Enhanced Engagement
textBlock3.text: Elevate your experience with our unique functionality. We've integrated a feature that enables you to attach a link to a specific encounter player. When the linked website supports it, it opens right within an iframe, so you don't have to switch between all your tabs. This keeps you engaged and immersed in the game, allowing for quick reference to monsters, player stats, or even a funny cat video.

textBlock4.title: Weird stuff
textBlock4.text: Because we are still in the start-up phase of this dnd tracker, sometimes mysterious errors may appear. Please don't hesitate and be sure to let us know so we can fix them quickly.

error.404: Oh no.. We lost this page
error.text: We searched everywhere but couldn't find what you're looking for. Let's find a better place for you to go.

remove.title: Bulk removing campaigns
remove.subtitle: Select campaigns to remove by clicking on them.

transfer.title: Transfer ownership
transfer.text: Transfer this campaign to another user who is already a team member

delete.title: Delete this campaign
delete.text: Once you delete a campaign, there is no going back. Please be certain

join.title: Answer the Call to Adventure: Join {campaign} Now!
join.text: Congratulations! You've received an invitation to join {campaign} as a {role}. Your opportunity to be a part of this incredible journey is right at your fingertips.

remove.title: Bulk removing encounters
remove.subtitle: Select encounters to remove by clicking on them.

encounter.info: You can jot something down here

removed.title: Encounter is removed
removed.text: Someone removed the encounter so it can't be used anymore

died.title: Player died
died.textMinHP: The player has too many negative hp and is dead
died.textDeathSaves: The player failed his death saves three times and is dead

stable.title: Player stabilized
stable.textDeathSaves: The player saved his death saves three times and is stabilized

register.consent: By registering, you agree to our terms and conditions

success.title: Successfully registrerd
success.text: Confirm your email address with the email we have sent you and afterwards you can login.

success.title: Email is sent
success.text: The email is sent to your mailbox.

pricing.title: Designed for the best dungeon masters, like you.
pricing.description: Choose a budget-friendly plan loaded with premium features to enrich your D&D encounters, engage your players, and create epic moments.
pricing.starter: The perfect choice for beginners and dungeon masters with 1-3 active campaigns.
pricing.medior: The ideal choice for experienced dungeon masters who run multiple campaigns simultaneously.
pricing.pro: The ultimate choice for professional dungeon masters and for those collaborating with multiple DMs on the same campaigns.
pricing.text: DnD Tracker is not managed by a large company but rather by a passionate individual with a love for both D&D and coding (and let's not forget about cats and coffee). The goal is not to get rich, which is why this is not a website with subscription fees. A one-time show of support is the greatest compliment you can give me. However, if you'd like to contribute even more, you can always consider donating a virtual cup of coffee.

contact.title: Love to hear from you, Get in touch

subscribeSuccess.title: Thank you for subscribing to our service! 🎉

text.one: You're now officially part of our community, and you're one step closer to unlocking a world of exciting updates and fantastic adventures. We can't wait to share our latest news and offerings with you.
text.two: In the meantime, grab your dice, gather your party, and prepare for epic adventures. Your journey with us has just begun, and together, we'll explore realms beyond imagination.
text.three: Stay tuned, and let the adventures begin!

cta.title: Calling All Brave Adventurers: Share Your Heroic Ideas!
cta.text: Brave adventurer, your counsel is sought! We yearn for your ideas and suggestions. Whether it be a heroic concept for a new feature, a refining touch for an existing one, or any other fantastical notion, be sure to let us know.

featureRequest.nothing: We haven't found a feature that matches these filters, but that doesn't mean you can't request it yourself! We are open to user feedback and strive to improve our services based on your suggestions.

noMember.title: You're not a team member
noMember.text: Oops! It seems like you're not a member, and you don't have access to this content. If you believe this is a mistake, please don't hesitate to reach out to the owner or an admin for assistance.

map.smallScreenCta: Attention Dungeon Architects! Dive into the world of larger screens (850px and up) and unveil the power to create stunning dungeon maps

max.title: Maximum Sprites Reached
max.text: You have reached the maximum allowable number of sprites on the map. Consider removing some sprites before adding new ones.

fantasyNameGenerator.title: Fantasy name generator
fantasyNameGenerator.description: Whether you're a seasoned Dungeon Master or just starting to explore the world of tabletop role-playing, our D&D Fantasy name generator has got your back. Never be at a loss for words when a player hits you with the question, "What's the name of this NPC?"

cookieBanner.text: Embark on an Epic Adventure: Accept Cookies to Enhance Your D&D Experience!

linkModal.placeholder: Amidst the realm of dragons and dungeons, a hero's legend remains untold, as the user has not yet linked their character's saga.

addInitiativeMonster.notFound: We haven't found a monster to match these filters, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself as homebrew!

summoner.info: when selecting a summon, you must also choose a character that will summon it.
summoner.nothing: Unfortunately, our quest unveils no treasures that align with your search. Perhaps another name can unlock the magical portal, or you can craft your own homebrew legends.

homebrewTable.nothing: We haven't found any homebrew that matches this search, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself.

table.nothing: We haven't found any { item } that matches this search, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself.

encounterTable.empty: Add a row to your encounter to get started!

confirmationModal.title: Delete confirmation
confirmationModal.text: To delete {title}, type the word DELETE into the field below

fullScreenSearch.notFound: Alas, our adventurous quest through the depths of our DnD archives has yielded no trace. The mystical tomes brimming with ancient lore and rules seem to temporarily withhold their secrets from us. But fear not! We shall not surrender! Feel free to continue your exploration in our magical realm, for who knows what epic discoveries await you.

toast.maxText: The maximum of pinned info cards is 10

infoDropdown.title: Pinned information cards
infoDropdown.cta: Unlock the full potential of your encounter! Pin essential information cards now to stay organized and maximize productivity.

badgeModal.title: Customize Your Profile with a Badge
badgeModal.nothing: No badge found with this code

addFeatureRequestModal.title: Create feature request
addFeatureRequestModal.submitted: Your feature request has been received with enthusiasm and is currently undergoing a careful evaluation. Once it is approved, everyone will have the opportunity to vote on it. You can check if the request has been approved when the label 'Under review' is no longer visible.

invited.title: The invitation has been sent successfully
invited.text: After accepting the invitation, the person is added as a team member

alreadyInvited.title: This person has already received an invitation
alreadyInvited.text: The person you have invited still has an active invitation for this campaign

transferOwnershipModal.title: Transfer ownership from {campaign}
transferOwnershipModal.text: Are you certain about transferring ownership from the {campaign} campaign? Please note that this action is irreversible unless the new owner decides to revert it. If you are absolutely sure, Enter {campaign} in the input field and then proceed to transfer.

success.title: Ownership has been successfully transferred to {username}

limitCta.text: You've reached the limit of your current plan. Unlock more features and benefits by upgrading now. Don't worry if you don't see your content it's not removed
